wiki.content:
"The Harder They Come" is a famous reggae song by the Jamaican singer Jimmy Cliff. It was first recorded for the soundtrack of the movie by the same name. "The Harder They Come" has been subsequently covered by many artists.
 
 The song was ranked #341 on Rolling Stone's "500 Greatest Songs of All Time".
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "The Harder They Come" is a famous reggae song by the Jamaican singer Jimmy Cliff. It was first recorded for the soundtrack of the movie by the same name. "The Harder They Come" has been subsequently covered by many artists.  The song was ranked #341 on Rolling Stone's "500 Greatest Songs of All Time".
